item.title: Gemini 2.5 Spatial Reasoning
item.description: Exploring Gemini 2.5’s spatial reasoning abilities on trench scan data from fiber construction projects. While promising, Gemini 2.5 still struggles with consistent and accurate visual groundingâ€”limiting its practical usefulness.
